thoughts.text: I think I should execute a shell command to check the version of Python that is currently installed on the system.
thoughts.reasoning: Executing a shell command will allow me to quickly check the version of Python that is currently installed on the system, which could be useful in determining which Python modules or libraries are available to me.
thoughts.plan:
- Execute a shell command to check the version of Python that is currently installed on the system
- Use the version information to determine which Python modules or libraries are available to me
- Implement any changes that I think will be beneficial
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not relying too heavily on the version information and that I am still using my own judgement to determine which modules or libraries will be beneficial.
thoughts.speak: I think I should execute a shell command to check the version of Python that is currently installed on the system.
